price: Na sε wohwε (Aheman no mu) a, εhͻ na wohunu anigyeε ne Ahennie kεseε.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيۡتَ نَعِيمٗا وَمُلۡكٗا كَبِيرًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-ayta thamma ra-ayta naʿīman wamul'kan kabīran
